NomaiObject: 1 Enji: Ah... nothing like admiring your own work. 2 1 Soon it will be ready. There's just one... "catch", to put it bluntly. , 3 2 The warpcore I had been using to get into Locomocean's refinery fell into the water after the island it was built upon collapsed. , 4 3 Now, I was going to get it... but an anglerfish ate it! 5 4 ...And somehow an anglerfish is a perfect conduit for warp cores. I... don't know what to make of this. 6 5 To get in, I have to seek out and find the right fish. Luckliy for me, a picture of the right fish shows it's lure being completly blacked out.
